title: minecraft:behavior.sonic_boom
description: Allows this entity to perform a 'sonic boom' ranged attack

attack_cooldown.description: Cooldown in seconds required after using this attack until the entity can use sonic boom again. Default value: 5.

attack_damage.description: Attack damage of the sonic boom. Default value: 30.

attack_range_horizontal.description: Horizontal range (in blocks) at which the sonic boom can damage the target. Default value: 15.

attack_range_vertical.description: Vertical range (in blocks) at which the sonic boom can damage the target. Default value: 20.

charge_sound.description: Sound event for the charge up.

duration.description: Goal duration in seconds Default value: 0.

duration_until_attack_sound.description: Duration in seconds until the attack sound is played. Default value: 1.7.

knockback_height_cap.description: Height cap of the attack knockback's vertical delta. Default value: 0.

knockback_horizontal_strength.description: Horizontal strength of the attack's knockback applied to the attack target. Default value: 0.

knockback_vertical_strength.description: Vertical strength of the attack's knockback applied to the attack target. Default value: 0.

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target. Default value: 1.
